subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin joined Wayne Gretzky and Mike Bossy as the only players to score at least 50 goals in four of their first five seasons as the Capitals defeated the Thrashers.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin joined Wayne Gretzky and Mike Bossy as the only players to score at least 50 goals in four of their first five seasons as the Capitals defeated the Thrashers.
